description:
When Relha`s group discover a treasure map they find themselves being pursued by an unknown force. When the force they think is following them turns out different from what they imagined, it`s secrets are then revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gakushin, Riten, Ukin, Mura o Mamoranto Suru no Koto
Gakushin, Riten, and Ukin Protect a Village
楽進, 李典, 于禁, 村を守らんとするのこと
